articles.title: DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Metallurgical Bases
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Makes Field Survey of Metallurgical Bases
Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, made a field survey of the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex and the Chongjin Steel Works.
					Going round various places including blast furnace No. 3 and the hot-rolling process of the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex and converter No. 1 of the Chongjin Steel Works, he encouraged the workers in their dynamic drive to carry out the Party's line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force.
					
					He acquainted himself with the project to put the production processes on a Juche and modern basis and production there before holding a consultative meeting of officials concerned.
					
					The meeting discussed the issues of further rounding off the Juche iron production system, setting the goal of technological updating under a long-term plan and attaining it in the shortest possible span of time.
					
					The meeting underlined the need for the relevant units to fully provide concentrated iron ore, coal, electricity, etc. needed for the production of iron and steel. 
					
					It, at the same time, took measures for solving scientific and technological matters arising in putting overall production processes on a Juche and modern basis on the basis of the achievements already made.
					
					Meanwhile, the premier learned about production and technological updating at the Soksong Coal Mine.
					
					The consultative meeting held on the spot referred to the issues of focusing efforts on infrastructural construction and the building of pits, raising the rate of mechanization of coal mining equipment and providing materials and equipment necessary for the project for building railway approach track, in particular, as early as possible.

articles.title: Egyptian Embassy Officials Help Korean Farmers
articles.content:
Egyptian Embassy Officials Help Korean Farmers
Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- Charge d'Affaires Ad Interim Amr Abdelwahab Mohieeldin Abuahmed and a staff member of the Egyptian embassy here did friendship labor at the DPRK-Egypt Friendship Sosamjong Vegetable Cooperative Farm in Ryokpho District, Pyongyang on Wednesday.
					The guests were briefed on the leadership feats of President Kim Il Sung before the monument to his field guidance given to the farm.
					
					The charge d'affaires ad interim wished the farmers good success in this year's farming.
					
					They handed aid materials to the farm.

articles.title: Preparations Made to Welcome Delegates to Meeting of KCU
articles.content:
Preparations Made to Welcome Delegates to Meeting of KCU
Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- Brisk preparations are now under way here to welcome the delegates to the 7th Meeting of the Korean Children's Union (KCU) from across the country. 
					Good arrangements are being made at  the Rungna People's Pleasure Park, Rungna Dolphinarium, Amusement Park in Kaeson Youth Park, People's Open-air Ice Rink and Skate Park so that they may spent pleasant days.
					
					The National Circus, Okryu Restaurant, Chongryu Restaurant, hotels and other units are fully ready to provide the best accommodation to the delegates.

articles.title: Phyongsong Synthetic Leather Factory Technologically Updated
articles.content:
Phyongsong Synthetic Leather Factory Technologically Updated
Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- The production processes of the Phyongsong Synthetic Leather Factory in South Phyongan Province were technologically updated and went operational.
					A ceremony for the completion of the project was held on Wednesday.
					
					Present there were Pak Pong Ju, premier of the Cabinet, officials concerned and employees of the factory.
					
					A letter of thanks of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea to the workers, technicians and officials of the factory was read out there.
					
					The WPK Central Committee in its letter highly praised them for developing the factory in a modern way suitable to the era of Songun.

articles.title: Mineral Springs in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Mineral Springs in Pyongyang
Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- There are lots of mineral springs in Pyongyang.
					Typical of them are Okryu and Hadang springs.
					
					In May Juche 75 (1986), leader Kim Jong Il named the mineral spring, found near the Okryu Bridge across the Taedong River, Okryu Mineral Spring and saw to it that a spa resort was built between the bridge and Okryu Restaurant.
					
					This mineral water contains K, Na, Mg, Fe and Cl and other ingredients, which are efficacious for such diseases as chronic gastritis, gastric and duodenal ulcers, chronic hepatitis, chronic enteritis and colitis, chronic bronchitis and diabetes. When it is applied to bathing, it helps adjust blood pressure.
					
					Hadang mineral water, too, is believed to have a great deal of medicinal effect. As a compound of Cl and Na, it is of slight alkalinity with HCO3, K and Mg.
					
					Pyongyang also boasts of Samma, Samsin, Kobangsan, Pothonggang, Haksan and Kuso mineral springs.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Accuses S. Korean Chief Executive of Her Reckless Remarks
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Accuses S. Korean Chief Executive of Her Reckless Remarks
Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- The south Korean chief executive is letting loose a spate of reckless remarks against fellow countrymen.
					She made no scruple of making such rubbish as "the DPRK cannot succeed in its new strategic line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force and "it is like a "fresh gambling." Her remarks are part of her mud-slinging aimed at hurting the dignity of its supreme leadership.
					
					She made such remarks as a follow-up of her outbursts calling for "a change" in the DPRK, decrying its line as an "impossible goal" during her U.S junket, not content with talking nonsense that "nukes would not help residents eke out their living."
					
					This is a blatant challenge to the DPRK's great inheritance of its earlier line at a new high stage. What she uttered only betrays her political ignorance and confrontation nature as a sycophant who is unable to shape even a simple strategy for carving out the destiny of the nation.
					
					The DPRK's new line is a strategic one laid down to protect the sovereignty, dignity, peace and prosperity of the nation under the tense political and military situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula created by foreign forces.
					
					Had the chief executive of south Korea had even an iota of awareness of being a member of the nation, she would not have misjudged the will of the DPRK, which adopted the new line as a state strategy and codified it under such hard conditions.
					
					Sovereignty is what keeps the country and nation alive. It is hard to protect it only by talking.  If a country is weak in its national power, it is bound to be deprived of everything by aggressors and such nation is bound to become slaves whose fate is no better than a dog in the house of grief. This is the bitter lesson taught by history and reality.
					
					Only when the DPRK, a small country surrounded by big powers, holds fast to the new strategic line, can it resolutely beat back foreign aggression and interference, achieve national reunification, the cherished desire of the nation, and enjoy prosperity for the generations to come.
					
					Being president of south Korea, she ought to know at least about the logical outcome stemming from the geopolitical position of this land where she lives and the international relations of dynamics.
					
					Her behavior of taking issue with the just line for the nation chosen by the fellow countrymen and unhesitatingly hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, bereft of this elementary perception, makes it clear that she has made up her mind to pursue confrontation with compatriots and push the inter-Korean relations to a collapse, dancing to her American master's tune of trumpeting about denuclearization aimed to disarm the DPRK.
					
					She is going beyond the line which she should not do in the inter-Korean relations as she is attaching greater importance to outsiders than fellow countrymen just as traitor Lee Myung Bak did and following in his footsteps.
					
					The south Korean authorities would be well advised to ponder over the adverse impact their irresponsible remarks would have on their own fate and the destiny of the nation.

articles.title: Minju Joson Flays U.S. for Turning Space into Battlefield
articles.content:
Minju Joson Flays U.S. for Turning Space into Battlefield
Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- It was recently reported that the U.S. Department of Defense began to make a comprehensive research into the "protection" of military and spy satellites.  To this end, all the U.S. experts on space development and projects for that purpose reportedly came under the Pentagon for the first time in its history.
					Minju Joson on Wednesday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					This indicates that Washington is working hard to realize the space militarization at a higher level and attain a military edge in outer space.
					
					The U.S. is talkative about "the protection of satellites" within the framework of the national security system, but this is no more than a pretext for justifying its moves for the space militarization and its ambition for world domination.
					
					Those satellites which the U.S. is keen to "protect" are nothing but means for carrying out its policy of aggression and military intervention in other countries.
					
					It is the U.S. strategic scenario to have a military monopoly of the space and carry out its strategy for dominating the world at any cost on its basis.
					
					What should not be overlooked is that the U.S. strategy for space militarization does not merely aim at "protection" and "defense".
					
					The U.S. made the conversion of the space into a huge theatre of military confrontation an established fact, while stepping up the preparations for military operations there.
					
					The above-said moves of the U.S. should be taken as grave crimes as they are a dangerous scenario to spark off an arms race even in the space.
					
					The U.S. would be well advised to drop the above-said scenario at once.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Consistently Keeping to Road of Independence, Songun and Socialism
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Consistently Keeping to Road of Independence, Songun and Socialism
Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) --The future of the Korean revolution remains rosy thanks to the strategy of eternal value for keeping to the road of independence, Songun and socialism. The DPRK will never deflect even a bit from the road of revolution indicated by the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in whatever storm and stress.
					Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says this in an editorial article.
					
					The words of independence, Songun and socialism reflect the lifelong desire and cause of the Generalissimos and they imply their undying feats as high as Mount Everest and as vast as an ocean.
					
					The new history of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea has been adorned under the banner of independence, Songun and socialism, the article says, and goes on:
					
					The history of the Korean revolution proves that the road of independence, Songun and socialism alone leads to a final victory in confrontation with imperialism.
					
					The history of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea teaches that the road of independence, Songun and socialism is the genuine road of realizing the centuries-old desire for a thriving nation.
					
					The steadfast independent principle, transparent stand of attaching importance to arms and the unshakable principle of socialism are the standard and key to settling all issues arising in the revolution and construction in the 21st century.
					
					Independence, Songun and socialism are the idea chosen by the Korean people themselves proceeding from the practical requirement of the Korean revolution, but it is the universally accepted idea in full line with the world trend in the 21st century. This road is the most ideal way chosen by them among all ways of revolution.
					
					Not only the present generation but posterity will steadfastly carry forward the baton of independence, Songun and socialism handed down by the revolutionary forerunners and thus give steady continuity to the revolutionary history of Kim Il Sung and the Songun revolutionary leadership history of Kim Jong Il on this land, concludes the article.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S. of Rejecting Replacement of Fragile AA by Peace Treaty
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S. of Rejecting Replacement of Fragile AA by Peace Treaty
Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- The United States has persistently opposed the replacement of the fragile Armistice Agreement (AA) by a lasting peace treaty in a sinister aim to recover from its shameful defeat in the Korean War and stifle the DPRK by force of arms at any cost.
					Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says this in a bylined article.
					
					It goes on:
					
					The spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army in a statement declared that the DPRK would totally nullify the AA. This was the DPRK's countermeasure against the U.S. systematic violation and nullification of the AA.
					
					The U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces finally staged the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills in a bid to ignite a nuclear war with huge armed forces for aggression involved. This was the most flagrant violation and annulment of the AA. 
					
					The U.S. persistent stance is to watch for an opportunity, while keeping the ceasefire state for an indefinite period as it does not want the conclusion of any peace-keeping mechanism with the DPRK. In other words, the U.S. will as ever seek to regard the DPRK as a belligerent party and an enemy to be "wiped out".
					
					It is as clear as a pikestaff that the AA can not prevent a new war on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					As long as the ceasefire state goes on, it is impossible to build a thriving nation and achieve a happy life and the prosperity of the nation. This is the conclusion drawn by the DPRK while being exposed to the threat of a war for several decades.
					
					If such unstable situation where a war may break out any moment and an unpredictable incident lead to the war, this will do the U.S. nothing good either.
					
					The ceasefire system, a leftover of the Korean War, should be replaced by a durable peace mechanism as early as possible.
					
					If any catastrophic incident takes place on the Korean Peninsula, the U.S. will be held wholly responsible for it as the U.S. has persistently scrapped the AA and opposed the conclusion of a peace treaty.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams Japan's Aim to Set Up "National Security Council"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams Japan's Aim to Set Up "National Security Council"
Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- The Japanese reactionaries' moves to set up the "National Security Council" aimed at overseas aggression are a very dangerous scenario to push the situation in Northeast Asia, on the Korean Peninsula, in particular, to the brink of a war. Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says this in a bylined article.
					The Japanese authorities claim that the situation in the vicinity of Japan remaining complicated and someone's "threat"  to it are the very reason why they are going to create such council but this is nothing but sheer hypocrisy, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					They seek to discuss and decide on a preemptive attack on the DPRK at the projected "National Security Council" while vociferating about "security of Japan" and the DPRK's military "threat." Their ultimate goal is to realize their ambition for staging a comeback to Korea.
					
					This is evidenced by the fact that while citing "threat" from the DPRK in the "defense programme guidelines" to be revised by them, they openly revealed their scenario for a preemptive attack on the DPRK, pushing for Japan's acquisition of the capability to attack the enemy's bases to cope with missile attacks.
					
					Their moves to step up the conversion of Japan into a military giant and turn it into a state for a war of aggression through the council are a grave challenge to progressive mankind aspiring after global peace and stability.
					
					The article calls upon the world progressive peace-loving people to be vigilant against Japan's moves to create the council.

articles.title: Japan Should Admit Its Past Wrongdoings: News Analyst
articles.content:
Japan Should Admit Its Past Wrongdoings: News Analyst
Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- Hashimoto, who co-heads the Japan Restoration Party, recently made reckless remarks insulting women as an outlet for men's sexual desire.
					His remarks have come under fire by the international community as a grave abuse of women's rights. Japanese women, too, criticized him as a villain bereft of an iota of humanity, demanding him retract the remarks and resign from office.
					
					In January 2007, Yanagisawa, the then Japanese minister of Health, Labor and Welfare, described women as a tool giving birth to child, touching off public outcry.
					
					During the Second World War, Japan committed a state-sponsored crime of forcing sexual slavery for the Japanese army upon a great number of women of many countries.
					
					At that time, the Japanese army instructed its soldiers to kill all pregnant women in enemy countries.
					
					In particular, they drafted as sexual slaves more than 200 000 Korean women, including teenagers. They even burnt to death those drafted women when they were infected with diseases.
					
					Enraged at this heinous crime, parliaments of various countries including the United States adopted resolutions critical of it and the world people have lifted their voice demanding an apology and reparation for the crime.
					
					Nevertheless, the reactionaries of Japan have not yet repented and apologized for it, far from making reparation. Instead, its high-ranking officials vie with each other in embellishing the crime-woven past.
					
					This is a revelation of Japan's wrong mode of politics as well as the view of its politicians steeped in militarism to the marrow.
					
					Japan should lend an ear to the voices of world community and honestly settle its crime-woven past.

articles.title: Members of Pro-Reunification Organizations Prosecuted in S. Korea
articles.content:
Members of Pro-Reunification Organizations Prosecuted in S. Korea
Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Inchon District Prosecution Office indicted the secretary general and two other members of the "Thongil Achim", an organization for the reunification movement, on charges of the violation of the "Security Law" by linking them with the Wangjaesan case, according to south Korean KBS on May 27.
					The puppet prosecution took such action for the mere reason that they had books praising the Juche idea and the Songun politics and posted on the website operated by the organization articles reflecting the north's assertion. 
					
					It also labeled the organization a "vanguard organization of Wangjaesan", claiming that they staged actions for reunification, opposed the south Korea-U.S. joint military exercises and the expansion of the U.S. military base in Phyongthaek and called for the withdrawal of the U.S. forces and the abolition of the "Security Law" in touch with the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification.
					
					As already known, the Wangjaesan case is a spyring case faked up by the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors. The truth about the conspiratorial case had been brought to light. 
					
					The court once ruled that there was no such organization called Wangjaesan.
					
					Nevertheless, the puppet conservative ruling forces have again raised the above-said case in a bid to deliberately link the organization with the DPRK and kick up a fascist whirlwind of suppression and racket for confrontation with the DPRK.

articles.title: Damage Done by Tick Spreads in S. Korea
articles.content:
Damage Done by Tick Spreads in S. Korea
Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- Damage done by tick is spreading in south Korea, according to south Korean broadcasting services.
					Tick known to be parasitic on cattle, dogs, etc. claimed casualties in different countries.
					
					Some days ago, an old man in his seventies who had been eking out his living by raising cattle in Sogwipho City on Jeju Island died of intense fever, vomiting, etc. Another person was reported to have died of the same disease there on May 27.
					
					The results of investigation proved that they were infected with virus spread by tick.
					
					Similar cases occurred in Seoul, Pusan, Taegu, North Chungchong and south Korean Kangwon provinces and other areas.
					
					Several persons have died or dozens of others have fallen seriously ill in south Korea due to tick since April 30.

articles.title: Japanese Ultra-Rightist Blamed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Japanese Ultra-Rightist Blamed in S. Korea
Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- South Korean victims of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army refused an interview with a Japanese ultra-rightist in their statement issued on May 24.
					They referred to the fact that they had been in activity for the solution to the sexual slavery issue while making a tour of several places of Japan from May 18.
					
					They denounced the Japan Restoration Party for sheltering its Co-Head Hashimoto who justified the sexual slavery.
					
					They branded Hashimoto being engrossed in foolish remarks as the target of judgment.
					
					Some media are feeding public the rumor that he will apologize for his remarks at the interview with victims, they said, stressing they can not change their bitter wounds with his honeyed words.
					
					Noting that they refuse the interview with Hashimoto, they called on him to admit his mistake and retire from the political life.

articles.title: Anniversary of Korean People's Victory in War to Be Marked in Switzerland
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korean People's Victory in War to Be Marked in Switzerland
Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- A Swiss preparatory committee for celebrating the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War was inaugurated in Basel on May 23.
					Martin Lotscher, chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee who doubles as chief of the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					The committee decided to post on its internet website works of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un and special articles and hold diverse political and cultural events including meeting and film show between July 1 and 28.

articles.title: Korean People's Victory in War Praised by Swiss Organization
articles.content:
Korean People's Victory in War Praised by Swiss Organization
Pyongyang, May 29 (KCNA) -- The historic victory the Korean people achieved under the outstanding leadership of President Kim Il Sung greatly encouraged people in the world under the colonial rule of the imperialists in their struggle for national liberation and social progress. 
					This was noted by the Swiss preparatory committee for celebrating the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War in a statement released at its inaugural ceremony held in Basel, Switzerland on May 23. 
					
					The statement went on:
					
					The Korean people will proudly greet July 27 this year, the 60th anniversary of the victory in the war, as a glorious festival of the Songun revolution.
					
					The Korean people and the heroic Korean People's Army defeated U.S. imperialism in the 3-year-long war, honorably defending the freedom and independence of the country under the Songun revolutionary leadership of the great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung, an invincible and iron-willed commander.
					
					The Korean people were recorded as the first nation which beat back the aggression of U.S. imperialism in history.
					
					The U.S. signed the Armistice Agreement as a defeated country on July 27, 1953.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju visita el Complejo Siderurgico Kim Chaek y la Aceria de Chongjin
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju visita el Complejo Siderurgico Kim Chaek y la Aceria de Chongjin
Pyongyang, 29 de mayo (ACNC) -- El primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Pong Ju, averiguo en el terreno la gestion del Complejo Siderurgico Kim Chaek y la Aceria de Chongjin. 
					Dando vueltas por el alto horno no. 3 y el taller de laminacion en caliente del Complejo Siderurgico Kim Chaek y el horno giratorio no. 1 y otros lugares de la Aceria de Chongjin, estimulo a los obreros que trabajan intensamente por materializar cabalmente la linea del Partido del Trabajo de Corea sobre el desarrollo paralelo de la construccion economica y la de fuerzas armadas nucleares. 
					
					Hizo conocimiento detallado del estado de produccion y modernizacion de los procesos productivos y convoco una reunion de consulta de los funcionarios correspondientes. 
					
					En la ocasion fueron discutidos los temas para perfeccionar el sistema de produccion del hierro Juche, establecer con vistas al futuro la meta de renovacion tecnica y alcanzarla lo mas pronto posible. 
					
					Y fueron buscadas las medidas para suministrar suficientemente en las unidades relacionadas los minerales de hierro y los concentrados, carbon y electricidad, y resolver los problemas cientifico-tecnicos que se presentan en la modernizacion de los procesos productivos a base de los exitos ya alcanzados. 
					
					Ademas, el premier averiguo el estado de produccion y reconstruccion de la Mina Carbonifera de Soksong.
					
					En la reunion consultiva realizada en el mismo terreno se tomaron las medidas para concentrar las fuerzas en la construccion de la infraestructura y las galerias, elevar la tasa de mecanizacion de los equipos de extraccion de carbon y suministrar con urgencia los materiales y equipos necesarios a la obra de las vias de acceso de ferrocarril.

articles.title: Pyongyang espera a los delegados de la ONC
articles.content:
Pyongyang espera a los delegados de la ONC
Pyongyang, 29 de mayo (ACNC) -- En esta capital se activan ahora en los preparativos para acoger a los delegados al VII Congreso de la Organizacion de Ninos de Corea (ONC).
					Las bases culturales e instituciones de servicio al pueblo aseguran el confort para que los delegados pequenos pasen dias alegres y divertidos.
					
					Se puede contar por ejemplo el Area de Recreo del Pueblo y el Acuario de Delfines, de Rungna, el Parque de Atracciones Juventud de Kaeson, el Centro de Patinaje al Aire Libre del Pueblo, el patinadero de ruedas, los restaurantes Okryu y Chongryu, etc.
					
					Los hoteles de esta capital hacen esfuerzos por asegurar en el maximo nivel las comodidades de los delegados.

articles.title: Inaugurado nuevo proceso en fabrica de cuero sintetico de Phyongsong
articles.content:
Inaugurado nuevo proceso en fabrica de cuero sintetico de Phyongsong
Pyongyang, 29 de mayo (ACNC) -- Quedo reconstruido un nuevo proceso de produccion de la Fabrica de Cuero Sintetico de Phyongsong situada en la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur.
					Tuvo lugar el dia 29 la ceremonia inaugural.
					
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes el premier coreano Pak Pong Ju y otros funcionarios junto con los empleados de la fabrica.
					
					Se dio lectura al mensaje de agradecimiento del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea enviado a los obreros, tecnicos y funcionarios de la fabrica.
					
					En la nota, el CC del PTC evaluo alto el hecho de que los obreros, tecnicos y funcionarios de la fabrica construyeron otra creacion monumental de la epoca del Songun.

articles.title: Liquidacion de pasado es unica salida de Japon
articles.content:
Liquidacion de pasado es unica salida de Japon
Pyongyang, 29 de mayo (ACNC) -- Hace poco, el co-representante del Partido de Restauracion de Japon solto unas palabras discriminantes a las mujeres, las cuales causan la consternacion de la sociedad internacional.
					Hasta las mujeres del pais isla califican a Hashimoto de bribon carente de sentido de DDHH y le demandan a pedir disculpa inmediata por el respecto y retirarse del puesto oficial.
					
					En enero de 2007, Yanagisawa, ministro de Salud, Trabajo y Bienestar de Japon de aquel tiempo, insulto gravemente a las mujeres como "maquina de parir"  provocando el tumulto social.
					
					?Adonde se dirigiria el pais isla guiado por esos tipejos que desprecian a las mujeres y pisotean la cualidad humana?
					
					La historia transcurrida da la clara respuesta a esa pregunta.
					
					Son sin precedentes en la historia humana los archi-crimenes antieticos cometidos en el tiempo pasado por los imperialistas japoneses que convirtieron a muchas mujeres de otros paises en esclavas sexuales movilizando el poderio estatal. En aquel tiempo, ellos mataron salvajemente a las mujeres de otros paises diciendo que hay que matar a las mujeres de "paises enemigos" que parian a bebes.
					
					Y les trataron como seres animales que satisfacian sus demandas sexuales.
					
					Particularmente, llevaron a 200 mil coreanas como esclavas sexuales de su ejercito y al final les asesinaron salvajemente.
					
					Los imperialistas japoneses bestiales reclutaron hasta a las mujeres casadas y las ninas de diez anos y picos y les impusieron la vida de esclava sexual. Les quemaron y arrojaron al rio o al monte si padecian de epidemias y cuando huian vencidos en las batallas les mataron cortando sus cabezas.
					
					Para denunciar tales crimenes atroces y graves, fueron aprobadas las resoluciones en los parlamentos de Canada, Filipinas y otros paises y  hasta en el Congreso norteamericano y se alzan dia a dia las voces en demanda de la disculpa y la indemnizacion.
					
					Pero, los reaccionarios japoneses no indemnizan ni piden disculpas hasta la fecha a mas de medio siglo de su derrota en la guerra, y los politicos de alto rango pronuncian las palabras vergonzosas que resucitan el fantasma de crimenes pasados.
					
					Japon debe prestar oidos a las voces indignadas de la sociedad internacional,  reconocer sus archi-crimenes antieticos y liquidar con sinceridad su pasado sucio.

articles.title: ACNC comenta ignorancia politica y naturaleza conflictiva de gobernante surcoreana
articles.content:
ACNC comenta ignorancia politica y naturaleza conflictiva de gobernante surcoreana
Pyongyang, 29 de mayo (ACNC) -- La gobernante del Sur de Corea calumnia  atrevidamente la maxima dignidad de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea diciendo que "la linea de desarrollo paralelo es un nuevo juego infructifero" y "con las armas nucleares no se puede asegurar la vida de la poblacion". 
					Durante su reciente visita a Estados Unidos, hablo de algun "cambio" de la RPDC disparateando que la linea de desarrollo paralelo es una "meta irrealizable". 
					
					Sus disparates  devienen el brutal desafio a la gran sucesion de la RPDC en una nueva etapa  elevada y la manifestacion de la ignorancia politica y la naturaleza conflictiva de la servidora a grandes potencias incapaz de  trazar ni una estrategia de corto alcance para forjar el destino de la nacion.
					
					La nueva linea de desarrollo paralelo de la construccion economica y la de las fuerzas armadas es la estrategica tomada para defender la soberania, la dignidad, la paz y la prosperidad de la nacion frente a la situacion politica y militar tan critica creada en la Peninsula Coreana por parte de las fuerzas extranjeras. 
					
					Si la autoridad surcoreana tuviera la minima conciencia como integrante de la nacion coreana, no despreciaria la voluntad de la RPDC que aun en medio de la situacion dificil aprobo y legalizo como estrategia estatal la linea de desarrollo paralelo. 
					
					La soberania es la vida de un pais y nacion y no se puede defenderla con la palabra. 
					
					La historia dejo la leccion de sangre de que las naciones con el poderio estatal debil no pueden defender el pais y sufren el destino de esclavos. 
					
					Solo cuando mantenga con firmeza la linea de desarrollo paralelo, la RPDC, pequeno pais rodeado por las potencias, puede frustrar las agresiones e intervenciones de las fuerzas extranjeras, lograr la reunificacion de la patria, anhelo nacional, y disfrutarse generacion tras generacion de una vida feliz. 
					
					Sin saber nada de la posicion geopolitica de Corea y de las relaciones mecanicas internacionales, la gobernante del Sur de Corea calumnia atrevidamente la justa linea y la maxima dignidad de sus connacionales. 
					
					Esto demuestra que ella pretende entregarse a la confrontacion fratricida y la ruptura de las relaciones intercoreanas, en adhesion a la insistencia de su amo norteamericano en la desnuclearizacion destinada a desarmar a la RPDC.
					
					La gobernante surcoreana pasa el limite de las relaciones intercoreanas como el traidor Lee Myung Bak que dio prioridad a las fuerzas extranjeras.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas deben reflexionarse en la consecuencia que emane de su conducta inconsciente.

articles.title: EE.UU. trata de convertir el cosmos en escenario de guerra, senala Minju Joson
articles.content:
EE.UU. trata de convertir el cosmos en escenario de guerra, senala Minju Joson
Pyongyang, 29 de mayo (ACNC) -- Segun trascendidos, el Departamento de Defensa de Estados Unidos entro en la investigacion general para "proteger" los satelites militares y espias. Para ese fin, se concentraran bajo la egida del Pentagono, por primera vez en la historia, todos los especialistas y los programas de desarrollo espacial.
					Ese hecho insinua que EE.UU. se esfuerza mucho por realizar en un nivel mas alto la militarizacion del cosmos y tomar la hegemonia militar en las galaxias, opina el rotativo Minju Joson en un comentario individual divulgado el dia 29.
					
					Si bien EE.UU. habla de la "proteccion de satelites" en el marco del sistema de seguridad estatal, eso no pasa de ser un pretexto para justificar la militarizacion del cosmos y su ambicion de controlar el mundo, subraya el comentarista y prosigue:
					
					Los satelites militares y espias, que quiere "proteger" EE.UU., son medios para la agresion y la intervencion militar contra otros paises.
					
					EE.UU. tiene el intento estrategico de monopolizar militarmente el cosmos y tomar la hegemonia mundial a base de ello.
					
					Lo insoslayable del caso es que la estrategia espacial de EE.UU. no se limita simplemente a la supuesta "proteccion" y "defensa".
					
					Al iniciar los preparativos para las operaciones militares en el espacio, EE.UU. expuso su intento de convertirlo en un escenario de enfrentamiento militar.
					
					Tales tentativas resultan acto criminal que va a extender hasta a las galaxias la carrera armamentista. 
					
					EE.UU. debe dejarse de esa ambicion criminal.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun revela objetivo de Japon de instalar "consejo de seguridad nacional"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun revela objetivo de Japon de instalar "consejo de seguridad nacional"
Pyongyang, 29 de mayo (ACNC) -- El intento de los reaccionarios japoneses de fundar el "consejo de seguridad nacional" es el mas peligroso acto que lleva al borde de la guerra la situacion del Nordeste Asiatico,  especialmente, de la Peninsula Coreana.
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual de este miercoles y continua:
					
					Las autoridades japonesas lo argumentan absurdamente so pretexto de la complicada situacion del contorno y la "amenaza" de alguien.
					
					Las fuerzas gobernantes japonesas pretenden realizar su ambicion de reagredir a Corea al discutir y determinar en el "consejo de seguridad nacional" el ataque preventivo contra la RPDC bajo el rotulo de la "seguridad de Japon" y la "amenaza" militar de ella.
					
					Lo comprueba el hecho de que en el "programa de defensa" que quieren reformar los reaccionarios japoneses han revelado abiertamente el intento de ataque preventivo contra la RPDC argumentando que deben poseer la capacidad de ataque a la base de misiles  de ella.
					
					A traves del "consejo de seguridad nacional" las actuales fuerzas gobernantes tratan de  acelerar la conversion de su pais en la potencia militar y en el Estado de guerra de agresion, lo que es el grave desafio a la humanidad progresista aspirante a la paz y la estabilidad del mundo.
					
					Los pueblos progresistas amantes de la paz mundial deben elevar la vigilancia sobre el intento de fundar el susodicho consejo de Japon que persigue convertirse en la potencia militar y realizar la agresion a ultramar.
